Key Arguments: The legislation turns big tech into censors along biased party and ideological lines.
The government uses the guise of 'safety' to justify an attack on free speech and open debate.
The legislation will lead to censorship of important information under the pretext of misinformation.
There is a lack of accountability for the government and tech companies when censorship occurs.
The legislation targets independent journalists while mainstream media remains unaffected.
The government desires control and power over speech, leading to authoritarianism.
Notable Quotes: The Government is literally having their cake and eating it too with this attack on free speech.
This legislation is to destroy the independent journalist, but that's okay because it's all in the name of 'safety'.
I'm so done with this country, watching Australia's slow march towards authoritarianism breaks my heart every single day.
